reviewText: Powerful film about creativity, art, and mental illness.

If you want a front seat on understanding how art positively influences recovery from mental health challenges, this is your documentary.  There are so few great films on this topic.  I saw this at the Santa Barbara Film Festival and bought it to show to my counselors and trainees.  It's worth owning.  Rebecca Williams, PhD, author of The Mindfulness Workbook for Addiction.

I highly recommend this movie.  The art is very interesting.

I have never seen a movie like this before.  This is probably the first time that a movie has shown what is is like to be a schizophrenic artist.
